"Why are you called Recovery Sports Grill?"
.entry-header
Founded by Don Led Duke, owner of BBL Companies, Recovery Sports Grill is more than just a sports grill—it’s a fan- and family-friendly restaurant with
great food and drinks
, and a casual atmosphere tied together by local and professional sports.
Recovery Sports Grill, managed by BBL Hospitality, started as the Recovery Room Sports Grill in 2007, a single location across from Albany Medical Center in Albany, New York. The name came from the restaurant’s proximity to the hospital, with the idea being that Recovery Room would serve as a getaway for those who were at the hospital during trying times, as well as the local sports buffs.
Today, there are 10 restaurants in five states. Don’s vision of a family-oriented restaurant has not been lost as the company moves forward in its expansion. We are a company that is not just passionate about sports—though we all are serious sports fans—but also dedicated to creating a fun and exciting environment focused on bringing the local community together over great food and drinks. As a way to give back, we even offer local sports groups and local organizations
fundraising opportunities
.
Find Nearest RSG
Learn More About BBL Hospitality
.entry-content
#post-##

At RSG, we’ve got the perfect space and menu options for your next event. Whether it’s a team dinner or a casual celebration, we’re here to make it a good time!

Contact Our Sports Restaurants
.entry-header
Your feedback is extremely important to us. Have advice? An idea? A concern or complaint (we hope not)? We read every inquiry or feedback left by our friends and valued customers. Please complete the form below to let us know about your time at our sports restaurant, so we can continue to improve and better your experience.
.entry-content
